attributes.action: make all lorry and bus drivers become cyclists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a cyclist and a car driver, I found that been both, I understand the needs of both parties. I like it if lorry drivers and bus drivers, have a mandatory prequiste to becoming lorry or bus drivers, by cycling through busy traffic, and for every yr to do a check-up course, so they understand the impact they have on cyclists.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
